sentences.sContent: He seems perfectly sane (= completely sane ) to me.
sentences.sCn: 在我看来他神志完全正常。

sentences.sContent: No sane person would want to kill a baby.
sentences.sCn: 神志正常的人不会去杀一个婴儿。

synos.tran: [心理]健全的；理智的；[临床]神志正常的

words.tran: 稳健地；心智健全地；理智地
明智；头脑清楚；精神健全；通情达理
心智健全；清醒，通情达理

trans.tranCn: 神志清楚的； 明智的
trans.tranOther: able to think in a normal and reasonable way
